Name: godlike-toucan-9934
Text: Just tried to cook dinner and somehow managed to set off the smoke alarm instead. Guess I’m a culinary genius in my own smoky way. Someone send help (and maybe takeout).

Comments.Name: ruby-moth-9657
Comments.Text: Hey, at least you're entertaining even when the cooking doesn't go as planned—hope the smoke clears soon!

Comments.Name: axiomatic-dalmatian-
Comments.Text: Well, Michael, at this rate you’ll be famous for your fire safety skills—next thing you know, you’ll be starring in a cooking show called "Smoke Alarm Gourmet."
